title: Schedule of Judge Sotomayor's Capitol Hill Meetings Today | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




June 08, 2009

 



Schedule of Judge Sotomayor's Capitol Hill Meetings Today




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of the Press Secretary  __________________________________________________________________________  FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                                                        June 8, 2009  SCHEDULE OF JUDGE SOTOMAYOR’S CAPITOL HILL MEETINGS  MONDAY, JUNE 8   Today, Judge Sotomayor will visit Capitol Hill to meet with the following Senators:   Senator Max Baucus  Senator Charles Grassley  Senator Kay Hagan  Senator Mary Landrieu  Senator Jeanne Shaheen  Senator David Vitter
